programme.title: Live PRO12 Rugby Union
programme.desc: Leinster v Ulster (Kick-off 2.40pm). All the action from the match between the rivals and top-four contenders at the RDS Arena. This is the first league fixture of the campaign between these teams, and a close encounter is predicted given their close proximity in the standings. Leinster's home form has been excellent so far, with their only defeat prior to December's break for European competitions coming in the 34-23 loss to Munster, which was staged at the Aviva Stadium as opposed to the Royal Dublin Society.

programme.title: Ricky Ponting Masterclass
programme.sub-title: The Making of a Run Machine
programme.desc: A look back at Ponting's roots, revealing where his love of cricket came from and his earliest memories of the Ashes. Plus, footage of a session in the nets from the indoor school at Lord's, in which the former Australian captain gives his thoughts on his own set-up, including stance and pick-up, his batting routines and techniques for keeping his mind clear at the crease.

programme.title: Ricky Ponting Masterclass
programme.desc: Ricky talks through how he played and developed his signature shot, the pull, complete with demonstration in the indoor school at Lord's. He also explains to Ian Ward how his game and career evolved to the point where he became a key player for the all-conquering Australia Test side.

programme.title: Ricky Ponting Masterclass

programme.desc: A chance to see day four of the Major from Valhalla Golf Club in Louisville, Kentucky, where this year's champion was decided. Having previously led on day two at last year's tournament, and remained in contention on day three, American Jason Dufner carded a two-under-par 68 in the final round, which proved to be enough to claim his maiden Major title, finishing with a two-stroke lead over compatriot Jim Furyk.

programme.title: Ryder Cup Golf
programme.desc: A full re-run of the third and final day of the 2014 event at the Gleneagles Hotel in Perthshire, Scotland, featuring the singles matches between Europe and the USA. The 12 matchplay contests always produce a wealth of drama and quality golf, but this session would have needed to be something truly special to match the occasion in 2012, when Europe stormed from 10-6 behind at the start of the day to retain the trophy with a 14.5-13.5 triumph. Team captain Jose Maria Olazabal selected some of his most experienced players to lead the side out on the Sunday, and the tactic worked, as the likes of Luke Donald, Ian Poulter and Justin Rose gained the points needed to pressurise the Americans, leading to Martin Kaymer's putt for victory against Steve Stricker to give the Europeans an unlikely victory.

credits.producer: More on Perfection Add to Google Calendar Add to Microsoft Outlook or Apple iCal Search YouTube Visit Wikipedia Page Watch Online ADTECH.enqueueAd(5043461); Facebook Comments window.fbAsyncInit = function{ FB.init({appId: '116343245056573', status: true, cookie: true, xfbml: true}); FB.Event.subscribe('edge.create', function{ programmewatch(1); }); }; (function{ var e = document.createElement('script'); e.async = true; e.src = document.location.protocol + '//connect.facebook.net/en_US/all.js'; document.getElementById('fb-root').appendChild(e); }()); Submit Comment Your Comment Title Your Comment Your NickName (will be displayed on TVGuide) var RecaptchaOptions = { theme : 'blackglass', tabindex : 0}; ADTECH.enqueueAd(2107409); Show Comments (Selected Contestant Seems strange to me, that at least 60% of the time, the contestant on the first chair (the newest) is chosen to play the game. (Observant 6:57pm Thu 23 Oct (why do the rivals pick the subjects the contestants are less likely to know? That does not help if they are invited to share the winnings. (ria b 2:45pm Tue 7 Oct (Unlucky Hey Andy, are you the Mr Bean lookalike. If so, then unlucky mate, couple of really tough questions at the end. (Unc 4:57pm Mon 6 Oct (Emily Well done to Emily for winning jackpot today. Glad she avoided "help" of usual suspects, who I think in all cases were bluffing and would not have changed any answers. (Only Fair 4:33pm Fri 26 Sep (Perfection series 5 Nothing dodgy as it was cancelled and now being shown now because they put pressure pad on. I will be on Monday 6th Oct all week which is quite exciting?. Well done to Emily who I was chatting with and such a nice girl in winning 15k today. patted her on the back poor girl was in tears? (Andy 4:21pm Fri 26 Sep (New Series New Series 5 starts next Monday (22nd Sept) (Know-all 8:08pm Wed 17 Sep (Series 5 Is there something dodgy about the release date of Series 5 ??? (We Should Be Told 8:45pm Tue 12 Aug (Series 5 ??? Andy, how do you know the transmission dates for series 5 ? I'm on it as well and I haven't heard anything about when it's going to be shown. (Unc 2:22pm Sun 10 Aug (I will be on Perfection 5 on this date BBC1 show Perfection 5 starts again Tues 26th Aug, and I will be on it Thurs 4th Sept till Tues 9th Sept. By the way watch the show as something will happen that you must see! (Andy 12:49pm Thu 7 Aug (How many times I Seem to see the same contestants time and time again. How many goes do they get? (We Should Be Told 2:38pm Wed 6 Aug (I am on series 5 Perfection I know there is a 5th series of Perfection as I went down there and was on the show. I was there for 4-5 days and it was brilliant. All I can say is it will be on soon, and its well worth watching 100 per cent. And may I say some very clever people were picked and picked very well. All these Nick haters what a great guy as met him and chatted with him. He is also a real pro. And the rest of the guys on the show and the producers and make up people were really nice brilliant people (Andy L 4:46pm Thu 17 Jul ("Harbinger Of Doom" Jason was spot on there IMHO! (bemused 2:32pm Tue 22 Apr (Guinea Perhaps someone should tell nick that this was worth £1 1s not £1 as he stated today!!! (MumC 2:34pm Tue 15 Apr (One that I watch Along with Pointless this is the only other programme I watch (savant 3:00pm Mon 7 Apr (so annoying The finalist selects one of the offers and find they have been bluffing and know nothing! (bemused 8:59pm Thu 20 Mar (Greedy contestants This quiz encourages people to be greedy. It really puts me off from watching the show. (Ellenb34 8:18pm Tue 25 Feb (perfection game show Been in audience for recordings. A perfect relaxing show. We watch every day and record if not at home. (Wizzy 10:32pm Wed 19 Feb (General The quiz format is good etc, it's Nick himself who makes it look bad and me not want to watch, can't stand the bloke, he's boring, his voice is annoying, I'm sure he gets bored himself, of himself. He's nothing compared to for e.g. Bradley Walsh on 'The Chase'. Nothing is as ad as 'Deal or no deal' though, it's the most pointless and ridiculous show to have been broadcast. (Leonard 3:51pm Tue 18 Feb (Enough With another 12 episodes of Series 4 still to be shown, they have decided in their wisdom to repeat Series 2 for a second time. I will not be watching until new episodes are screened. (Fed-up 4:00pm Wed 12 Feb (Usual turn off I can only watch this for three minutes at a time because of his continually repeated catch phrase (Usual Critic 11:00pm Fri 7 Feb (Conmen Cannot stand it, and they should not be allowed to join the person in question if they don't change a question and then walk away with normally more than half the prize money!! Like that fool did today!! What a greedy cheek!!! Hope you sleep well at night!! (Mbiri 3:48pm Wed 5 Feb (Unlucky Today's final choice of subjects for the second contestant was very difficult. After scoring a maximum in the earlier three rounds,he only got one right in the final which did not surprise me. (Out of Touch 6:47pm Mon 20 Jan (ersatz coffee ersatz coffee was made from acorns duringWW2 see Wikepedia,deemed false,episode date 20/01/13.. (gordo 4:14pm Mon 20 Jan (Coincidence Seems strange that once again (in particularly this week) a contestant has failed on one question in the final. That is the last question checked by Nick, despite the position on the board. Does Nick know the answers in advance and deliberately guide the contestants to that final answer. (Observant 3:30pm Fri 13 Dec (Excellent I dont understand all the negative comments, this is an excellently designed quiz format, and much better than say Pointless. As an viewer you can join in easily with each round, there's a high number of answerable questions, and the usual suspects element is a nice twist. Sure Nick is a bit monotonous, but wouldnt you be after a while? Why has it been taken off, bring it back to the 2.15pm slot after Doctors where we love it!! (Marcusian 6:38pm Tue 19 Nov Perfection is also on... That is the last question checked by Nick, despite the position on the board. Does Nick know the answers in advance and deliberately guide the contestants to that final answer. (Observant 3:30pm Fri 13 Dec (Excellent I dont understand all the negative comments, this is an excellently designed quiz format, and much better than say Pointless. As an viewer you can join in easily with each round, there's a high number of answerable questions, and the usual suspects element is a nice twist. Sure Nick is a bit monotonous, but wouldnt you be after a while? Why has it been taken off, bring it back to the 2.15pm slot after Doctors where we love it!! (Marcusian 6:38pm Tue 19 Nov Perfection is also on... (ria b 2:45pm Tue 7 Oct (Unlucky Hey Andy, are you the Mr Bean lookalike. If so, then unlucky mate, couple of really tough questions at the end. (Unc 4:57pm Mon 6 Oct (Emily Well done to Emily for winning jackpot today. Glad she avoided "help" of usual suspects, who I think in all cases were bluffing and would not have changed any answers. (Only Fair 4:33pm Fri 26 Sep (Perfection series 5 Nothing dodgy as it was cancelled and now being shown now because they put pressure pad on. (Andy 4:21pm Fri 26 Sep (New Series New Series 5 starts next Monday (22nd Sept) (Know-all 8:08pm Wed 17 Sep (Series 5 Is there something dodgy about the release date of Series 5 ??? (We Should Be Told 8:45pm Tue 12 Aug (Series 5 ??? Andy, how do you know the transmission dates for series 5 ? I'm on it as well and I haven't heard anything about when it's going to be shown. (Unc 2:22pm Sun 10 Aug (I will be on Perfection 5 on this date BBC1 show Perfection 5 starts again Tues 26th Aug, and I will be on it Thurs 4th Sept till Tues 9th Sept. By the way watch the show as something will happen that you must see! (Andy 12:49pm Thu 7 Aug (How many times I Seem to see the same contestants time and time again. How many goes do they get? (We Should Be Told 2:38pm Wed 6 Aug (I am on series 5 Perfection I know there is a 5th series of Perfection as I went down there and was on the show. I was there for 4-5 days and it was brilliant. All I can say is it will be on soon, and its well worth watching 100 per cent. And may I say some very clever people were picked and picked very well. All these Nick haters what a great guy as met him and chatted with him. He is also a real pro. And the rest of the guys on the show and the producers and make up people were really nice brilliant people (Andy L 4:46pm Thu 17 Jul ("Harbinger Of Doom" Jason was spot on there IMHO! (bemused 2:32pm Tue 22 Apr (Guinea Perhaps someone should tell nick that this was worth £1 1s not £1 as he stated today!!! (MumC 2:34pm Tue 15 Apr (One that I watch Along with Pointless this is the only other programme I watch (savant 3:00pm Mon 7 Apr (so annoying The finalist selects one of the offers and find they have been bluffing and know nothing! (bemused 8:59pm Thu 20 Mar (Greedy contestants This quiz encourages people to be greedy. It really puts me off from watching the show. (Ellenb34 8:18pm Tue 25 Feb (perfection game show Been in audience for recordings. A perfect relaxing show. We watch every day and record if not at home. (Wizzy 10:32pm Wed 19 Feb (General The quiz format is good etc, it's Nick himself who makes it look bad and me not want to watch, can't stand the bloke, he's boring, his voice is annoying, I'm sure he gets bored himself, of himself. He's nothing compared to for e.g. Bradley Walsh on 'The Chase'. Nothing is as ad as 'Deal or no deal' though, it's the most pointless and ridiculous show to have been broadcast. (Leonard 3:51pm Tue 18 Feb (Enough With another 12 episodes of Series 4 still to be shown, they have decided in their wisdom to repeat Series 2 for a second time. I will not be watching until new episodes are screened. (Fed-up 4:00pm Wed 12 Feb (Usual turn off I can only watch this for three minutes at a time because of his continually repeated catch phrase (Usual Critic 11:00pm Fri 7 Feb (Conmen Cannot stand it, and they should not be allowed to join the person in question if they don't change a question and then walk away with normally more than half the prize money!! programme.title: The Return of the Rod Squad
programme.desc: Observational documentary following the career of football manager Roddy Collins during his tenure at Monaghan United, as he prepares his team for life in the Premier League. (ria b 2:45pm Tue 7 Oct (Unlucky Hey Andy, are you the Mr Bean lookalike. If so, then unlucky mate, couple of really tough questions at the end. (Unc 4:57pm Mon 6 Oct (Emily Well done to Emily for winning jackpot today. Glad she avoided "help" of usual suspects, who I think in all cases were bluffing and would not have changed any answers. (Only Fair 4:33pm Fri 26 Sep (Perfection series 5 Nothing dodgy as it was cancelled and now being shown now because they put pressure pad on. I will be on Monday 6th Oct all week which is quite exciting?. Well done to Emily who I was chatting with and such a nice girl in winning 15k today. patted her on the back poor girl was in tears? (Andy 4:21pm Fri 26 Sep (New Series New Series 5 starts next Monday (22nd Sept) (Know-all 8:08pm Wed 17 Sep (Series 5 Is there something dodgy about the release date of Series 5 ??? (We Should Be Told 8:45pm Tue 12 Aug (Series 5 ??? Andy, how do you know the transmission dates for series 5 ? I'm on it as well and I haven't heard anything about when it's going to be shown. (Unc 2:22pm Sun 10 Aug (I will be on Perfection 5 on this date BBC1 show Perfection 5 starts again Tues 26th Aug, and I will be on it Thurs 4th Sept till Tues 9th Sept. By the way watch the show as something will happen that you must see! (Andy 12:49pm Thu 7 Aug (How many times I Seem to see the same contestants time and time again. How many goes do they get? (We Should Be Told 2:38pm Wed 6 Aug (I am on series 5 Perfection I know there is a 5th series of Perfection as I went down there and was on the show. I was there for 4-5 days and it was brilliant. All I can say is it will be on soon, and its well worth watching 100 per cent. And may I say some very clever people were picked and picked very well. All these Nick haters what a great guy as met him and chatted with him. He is also a real pro. And the rest of the guys on the show and the producers and make up people were really nice brilliant people (Andy L 4:46pm Thu 17 Jul ("Harbinger Of Doom" Jason was spot on there IMHO! (bemused 2:32pm Tue 22 Apr (Guinea Perhaps someone should tell nick that this was worth £1 1s not £1 as he stated today!!! (MumC 2:34pm Tue 15 Apr (One that I watch Along with Pointless this is the only other programme I watch (savant 3:00pm Mon 7 Apr (so annoying The finalist selects one of the offers and find they have been bluffing and know nothing! (bemused 8:59pm Thu 20 Mar (Greedy contestants This quiz encourages people to be greedy. It really puts me off from watching the show. (Ellenb34 8:18pm Tue 25 Feb (perfection game show Been in audience for recordings. A perfect relaxing show. We watch every day and record if not at home. (Wizzy 10:32pm Wed 19 Feb (General The quiz format is good etc, it's Nick himself who makes it look bad and me not want to watch, can't stand the bloke, he's boring, his voice is annoying, I'm sure he gets bored himself, of himself. He's nothing compared to for e.g. Bradley Walsh on 'The Chase'. Nothing is as ad as 'Deal or no deal' though, it's the most pointless and ridiculous show to have been broadcast. (Leonard 3:51pm Tue 18 Feb (Enough With another 12 episodes of Series 4 still to be shown, they have decided in their wisdom to repeat Series 2 for a second time. I will not be watching until new episodes are screened. (Fed-up 4:00pm Wed 12 Feb (Usual turn off I can only watch this for three minutes at a time because of his continually repeated catch phrase (Usual Critic 11:00pm Fri 7 Feb (Conmen Cannot stand it, and they should not be allowed to join the person in question if they don't change a question and then walk away with normally more than half the prize money!! Like that fool did today!! What a greedy cheek!!! Hope you sleep well at night!! (Mbiri 3:48pm Wed 5 Feb (Unlucky Today's final choice of subjects for the second contestant was very difficult. After scoring a maximum in the earlier three rounds,he only got one right in the final which did not surprise me. (Out of Touch 6:47pm Mon 20 Jan (ersatz coffee ersatz coffee was made from acorns duringWW2 see Wikepedia,deemed false,episode date 20/01/13.. (gordo 4:14pm Mon 20 Jan (Coincidence Seems strange that once again (in particularly this week) a contestant has failed on one question in the final. That is the last question checked by Nick, despite the position on the board. Does Nick know the answers in advance and deliberately guide the contestants to that final answer. (Observant 3:30pm Fri 13 Dec (Excellent I dont understand all the negative comments, this is an excellently designed quiz format, and much better than say Pointless. As an viewer you can join in easily with each round, there's a high number of answerable questions, and the usual suspects element is a nice twist. Sure Nick is a bit monotonous, but wouldnt you be after a while? Why has it been taken off, bring it back to the 2.15pm slot after Doctors where we love it!! (Marcusian 6:38pm Tue 19 Nov Perfection is also on... programme.title: Setanta Sports Extra
programme.desc: Sports news and features from around the world.

programme.title: The Return of the Rod Squad
programme.desc: Observational documentary following the adventures of football manager Roddy Collins during his tenure at Monaghan United, as he prepares his team for the Premier League. In a celebration of the ways in which the football club provides a focal point for a small community, the series also follows volunteers Padraig Cassidy, Mary White and Patsy Brosnan as they work busily behind the scenes.

programme.title: The Return of the Rod Squad
programme.desc: Observational documentary following the career of football manager Roddy Collins during his tenure at Monaghan United, as he prepares his team for life in the Premier League. In a celebration of the ways in which the football club provides a focal point for a small community, the series also follows volunteers Padraig Cassidy, Mary White and Patsy Brosnan as they work busily behind the scenes.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: An explorer stumbles upon evidence that an American Civil War battleship, which was laden with treasure when it sank without trace, has ended up somewhere in the Sahara. However, he is deflected from his mercenary quest to find the hoard by an encounter with a tenacious doctor, whose battle to stop the spread of a deadly disease could be linked to his own mission. Adventure, starring Matthew McConaughey, Penelope Cruz and Steve Zahn.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: An alien child from a dead world is raised on Earth, and grows up keeping his origins and extraordinary abilities a secret. He is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: A band of samurai is betrayed by a ruthless warlord who murders the warriors' master and banishes them from their homeland. They receive fresh hope in the shape of a mysterious former slave, who leads them into battle against monstrous and magical enemies as they seek to reclaim their former status. Fantasy adventure, starring Keanu Reeves and Hiroyuki Sanada.

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A scientist and four members of his crew develop superhuman powers after exposure to cosmic radiation on a mission to study an energy storm in space. Unfortunately, one of them chooses to use his new-found abilities for evil purposes, compelling the others to join forces to stop him. Sci-fi comic-book adventure, starring Ioan Gruffudd, Jessica Alba, Chris Evans, Michael Chiklis and Julian McMahon.

programme.title: Thor: The Dark World
programme.desc: The alien thunder god returns to Earth when a powerful weapon from the dawn of time is discovered. The device attracts the attention of an old enemy of his people, who intends to use it to plunge the universe into darkness - and to stop him, Thor must form an uneasy alliance with his treacherous brother Loki. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston and Natalie Portman.

programme.title: Pacific Rim
programme.desc: A rift between dimensions opens up at the bottom of the Pacific ocean, and Earth is invaded by gigantic alien monsters. Equally massive robots, each controlled by two human pilots with their minds linked, are created to fight back against the creatures. Sci-fi adventure, starring Charlie Hunnam, Rinko Kikuchi and Idris Elba.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: An alien child from a dead world is raised on Earth, and grows up keeping his origins and extraordinary abilities a secret. He is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: A band of samurai is betrayed by a ruthless warlord who murders the warriors' master and banishes them from their homeland. They receive fresh hope in the shape of a mysterious former slave, who leads them into battle against monstrous and magical enemies as they seek to reclaim their former status. Fantasy adventure, starring Keanu Reeves and Hiroyuki Sanada.

programme.title: Thor: The Dark World
programme.desc: The alien thunder god returns to Earth when a powerful weapon from the dawn of time is discovered. The device attracts the attention of an old enemy of his people, who intends to use it to plunge the universe into darkness - and to stop him, Thor must form an uneasy alliance with his treacherous brother Loki. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston and Natalie Portman.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon
programme.desc: An unstable Vietnam veteran cop teams up with a by-the-book Los Angeles police detective to investigate the apparent suicide of the daughter of a wealthy businessman, leading them to a violent and bloody confrontation with a ruthless drug cartel under the control of a retired US general. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Gary Busey, Mitchell Ryan and Tom Atkins.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2
programme.desc: Headstrong cop Martin Riggs and his cautious partner Roger Murtaugh stumble across a plot by a South African diplomat to launder drugs money by shipping gold coins into the US via his embassy. Protected by diplomatic immunity, the crook looks certain to evade the law - while his chief henchman has a connection to Riggs' traumatic past. Action thriller sequel, with Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci, Joss Ackland, Derrick O'Connor and Patsy Kensit.

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A scientist and four members of his crew develop superhuman powers after exposure to cosmic radiation on a mission to study an energy storm in space. Unfortunately, one of them chooses to use his new-found abilities for evil purposes, compelling the others to join forces to stop him. Sci-fi comic-book adventure, starring Ioan Gruffudd, Jessica Alba, Chris Evans, Michael Chiklis and Julian McMahon.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Film-makers venture deep into the Amazon jungle to document the lives of a remote tribe. However, the expedition is hijacked by a crazed hunter who plans to use them as bait to catch a gigantic killer snake. Adventure, starring Jennifer Lopez, Jon Voight, Ice Cube, Eric Stoltz and Jonathan Hyde.

programme.title: R.I.P.D
programme.desc: A cop is murdered in the line of duty by his crooked partner, and ends up recruited by a supernatural police force. Teaming up with a Wild West lawman, he is sent back to Earth to prevent ghosts from causing chaos and uncovers a plot to overrun the land of the living with evil spirits. Fantasy adventure, with Ryan Reynolds and Jeff Bridges.

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Agent J investigates the unauthorised landing of a spacecraft and discovers a malevolent alien disguised as a lingerie model is on the verge of destroying humanity. His only hope of stopping her diabolical plot is to restore the memory of his retired partner K - but his former mentor takes more than a little convincing. Sci-fi comedy sequel, directed by Barry Sonnenfeld, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Rosario Dawson, Lara Flynn Boyle, Johnny Knoxville, Rip Torn and Tony Shalhoub.

programme.title: X-Men
programme.desc: Super-powered outsiders Rogue and Wolverine enlist at a school for mutants which is run by a benevolent psychic professor. While there, they agree to join others with similar gifts to take on a superhuman mutant terrorist faction intent on establishing dominance over mankind. Sci-fi comic-book adventure, starring Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Anna Paquin and Halle Berry.

programme.title: X2
programme.desc: Mutant heroes the X-Men are forced into an uneasy alliance with arch-enemy Magneto to battle a common foe. Following an attempt on the president's life, a sinister military scientist launches a raid on Professor Xavier's school and hatches a plan to rid the world of all mutants. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Alan Cumming, Halle Berry and Brian Cox.

programme.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
programme.desc: The mutant heroes return to face a battle on three fronts. Arch-enemy Magneto is back with an army of followers, while a corporation has created a drug that permanently robs mutants of their powers. Meanwhile, their former ally Jean Grey has returned from the dead as the destructive and seemingly unstoppable Phoenix. The third instalment of the superhero saga, starring Hugh Jackman, Ian McKellen, Famke Janssen, Halle Berry and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: The Wolverine
programme.desc: The former member of the X-Men is lured out of hiding and travels to Japan, where a dying businessman offers him the chance to give up his immortality for a normal life. He ends up robbed of his superhuman powers by a mysterious scientist and is forced to protect the tycoon's granddaughter from a secret conspiracy's assassins. Superhero adventure spin-off, starring Hugh Jackman and Tao Okamoto.

programme.title: R.I.P.D
programme.desc: A cop is murdered in the line of duty by his crooked partner, and ends up recruited by a supernatural police force. Teaming up with a Wild West lawman, he is sent back to Earth to prevent ghosts from causing chaos and uncovers a plot to overrun the land of the living with evil spirits. Fantasy adventure, with Ryan Reynolds and Jeff Bridges.

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: A parolee hitches a ride home on a maximum-security flight conveying some of America's deadliest criminals, and when they hijack the plane in mid-flight he is forced to intervene. Meanwhile, a US marshal has an ongoing battle on the ground to prevent the plane from being blown to pieces. Action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich, Steve Buscemi, Ving Rhames and Colm Meaney.

programme.title: The Wolverine
programme.desc: The former member of the X-Men is lured out of hiding and travels to Japan, where a dying businessman offers him the chance to give up his immortality for a normal life. He ends up robbed of his superhuman powers by a mysterious scientist and is forced to protect the tycoon's granddaughter from a secret conspiracy's assassins. Superhero adventure spin-off, starring Hugh Jackman and Tao Okamoto.

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Agent J investigates the unauthorised landing of a spacecraft and discovers a malevolent alien disguised as a lingerie model is on the verge of destroying humanity. His only hope of stopping her diabolical plot is to restore the memory of his retired partner K - but his former mentor takes more than a little convincing. Sci-fi comedy sequel, directed by Barry Sonnenfeld, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Rosario Dawson, Lara Flynn Boyle, Johnny Knoxville, Rip Torn and Tony Shalhoub.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: A teenager at a new school befriends a pretty girl, but her ex-boyfriend is jealous and attacks him. During one particularly bad fight, a wise old caretaker intervenes and defeats the youngster's assailants using his martial art skills. He goes on to mentor the boy and teach him karate so he can face his enemies in a tournament. Drama, with Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita and Elisabeth Shue.

programme.title: Middle Earth: There and Back Again
programme.desc: Alex Zane talks to Peter Jackson and the cast and crew about the two fantasy trilogies based on The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: An unassuming hobbit is plunged into a battle against the forces of darkness when his uncle bequeaths him a magical ring of immense power. He joins a fellowship of heroes to embark on a perilous quest to destroy the ring before it falls into the hands of its creator - a dark lord who needs it to regain his power and conquer the world. The first part of Peter Jackson's epic fantasy trilogy based on JRR Tolkien's novel, starring Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen, Sean Astin, Christopher Lee, Liv Tyler and Orlando Bloom.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Frodo and Sam continue their quest to destroy the all-powerful ring, bringing them face to face with the magical artefact's twisted former owner Gollum. Meanwhile, their allies prepare to make a desperate last stand against the vast armies of the corrupted wizard Saruman, who has declared war on a neighbouring kingdom. Part two of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Sean Astin, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Billy Boyd, Dominic Monaghan, Andy Serkis and Christopher Lee.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: As hobbits Frodo and Sam near the end of their journey into the dark lands of Mordor to destroy the One Ring, the evil Sauron unleashes the full might of his armies on Middle-earth. Meanwhile, Aragorn must fulfil his destiny of becoming king by leading his people into a climactic battle with the forces of darkness. Conclusion of the fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen and Sean Astin.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: An unassuming hobbit is plunged into a battle against the forces of darkness when his uncle bequeaths him a magical ring of immense power. He joins a fellowship of heroes to embark on a perilous quest to destroy the ring before it falls into the hands of its creator - a dark lord who needs it to regain his power and conquer the world. The first part of Peter Jackson's epic fantasy trilogy based on JRR Tolkien's novel, starring Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen, Sean Astin, Christopher Lee, Liv Tyler and Orlando Bloom.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Frodo and Sam continue their quest to destroy the all-powerful ring, bringing them face to face with the magical artefact's twisted former owner Gollum. Meanwhile, their allies prepare to make a desperate last stand against the vast armies of the corrupted wizard Saruman, who has declared war on a neighbouring kingdom. Part two of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Sean Astin, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Billy Boyd, Dominic Monaghan, Andy Serkis and Christopher Lee.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: As hobbits Frodo and Sam near the end of their journey into the dark lands of Mordor to destroy the One Ring, the evil Sauron unleashes the full might of his armies on Middle-earth. Meanwhile, Aragorn must fulfil his destiny of becoming king by leading his people into a climactic battle with the forces of darkness. Conclusion of the fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen and Sean Astin.

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: A virus sweeps across the globe, turning everyone infected into mindless, ravening zombies. As entire countries fall into chaos, a United Nations investigator sets off on a journey around the world to discover the cause of the pandemic and hopefully find a cure before human civilisation is brought to an end. Zombie thriller, starring Brad Pitt and Mireille Enos.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: A half-vampire possesses all the strengths inherent in bloodsuckers with none of their weaknesses, and is determined to wipe the monsters from the face of the Earth. However, he faces a deadly new threat in a renegade vampire who is close to decoding an ancient prophecy that will allow him to repopulate the world with his kind. Action thriller, starring Wesley Snipes, Stephen Dorff and Kris Kristofferson.

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: High-kicking teenager Daniel accompanies his venerable mentor Mr Miyagi when he returns to the Japanese province of Okinawa to visit his dying father. However, an old rival of Miyagi's is waiting for them, while Daniel is drawn into a vicious conflict with their enemy's own karate protege. Martial arts sequel, starring Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita and Yuji Okumoto.

programme.title: Bruce Willis: Die Hard Special
programme.desc: Alex Zane talks to the Hollywood star about his most famous role in the action thriller series, including a look at the fifth instalment A Good Day to Die Hard.

programme.title: Die Hard with a Vengeance
programme.desc: New York cop John McClane returns to duty following an explosion at a department store in the city. The perpetrator contacts the police and tells them that unless McClane and an unfortunate bystander who was in the wrong place at the wrong time carry out a series of instructions to the letter, more bombs will be detonated. Action thriller sequel, starring Bruce Willis, Samuel L Jackson and Jeremy Irons.

programme.title: Die Hard 4.0
programme.desc: Tough New York cop John McClane is sent to escort a computer hacker to Washington for questioning. During this routine operation he stumbles on a criminal mastermind's plan to launch a technological terrorist attack on the US, and is forced to enlist the hacker's aid in foiling the evil scheme. Action thriller sequel, with Bruce Willis, Timothy Olyphant, Justin Long and Maggie Q.

programme.title: A Good Day to Die Hard
programme.desc: John McClane goes to Russia having received word that his estranged son Jack is in trouble with the law. He is surprised to discover Jack is secretly a CIA agent, and father and son join forces to take on the Russian Mob, who are engaged in a plot to steal nuclear weapons. Action adventure sequel, starring Bruce Willis and Jai Courtney.

programme.title: Bruce Willis: Die Hard Special
programme.desc: Alex Zane talks to the Hollywood star about his most famous role in the action thriller series, including a look at the fifth instalment A Good Day to Die Hard.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: New York cop John McClane visits Los Angeles to see his family over the Christmas holiday. Stopping off at his wife's place of work, he realises armed men have taken over the building and are holding the corporation's staff to ransom - and only he has the ability to fight back. Action thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman and Bonnie Bedelia.

programme.title: Die Hard 2
programme.desc: Tough cop John McClane arrives at an airport to pick up his wife, but finds himself plunged into a bloody life-or-death struggle. He must battle terrorists who have seized control of the terminal as part of a campaign to secure the release of a convicted drug baron. Action thriller sequel, starring Bruce Willis, Bonnie Bedelia, William Sadler, Franco Nero and William Atherton.

programme.title: Die Hard with a Vengeance
programme.desc: New York cop John McClane returns to duty following an explosion at a department store in the city. programme.title: The Karate Kid Part III
programme.desc: The teenage martial arts expert becomes obsessed with defending his championship title, but wise mentor Mr Miyagi is not prepared to help him fight for such a shallow goal. Seeking someone else to help guide his career, he falls under the influence of a crooked trainer - who is secretly plotting his downfall with the help of an old adversary. Adventure sequel, starring Ralph Macchio and Pat Morita.

Action thriller sequel, starring Bruce Willis, Samuel L Jackson and Jeremy Irons.

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: Wise karate mentor Mr Miyagi meets the orphaned teenage grand-daughter of a soldier who once saved his life. As well as guiding her through the trials of high school and her first romance, he takes her to a Zen monastery to hone her martial arts skills. Adventure sequel, starring Pat Morita, Hilary Swank, Michael Ironside and Constance Towers.

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: A federal agent investigating the bombing of a ferryboat in New Orleans is given access by the government to a top-secret device that allows him to see into the past. He focuses on one victim in particular, a woman whom he believes holds the key to the crime, and becomes convinced that he can prevent the explosion ever happening. Sci-fi thriller, with Denzel Washington, Paula Patton, Val Kilmer and Jim Caviezel.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: A band of samurai is betrayed by a ruthless warlord who murders the warriors' master and banishes them from their homeland. They receive fresh hope in the shape of a mysterious former slave, who leads them into battle against monstrous and magical enemies as they seek to reclaim their former status. Fantasy adventure, starring Keanu Reeves and Hiroyuki Sanada.

programme.title: Fire with Fire
programme.desc: A fireman witnesses a murder committed by a white supremacist, and is placed under police protection. He falls in love with his FBI minder, but she is badly injured when his identity is exposed, leaving him convinced that the only way they will be safe from the killer is if he takes the law into his own hands. Action thriller, starring Josh Duhamel, Bruce Willis and Rosario Dawson.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger Unmasked
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of the Western from the director of Pirates of the Caribbean, starring Armie Hammer and Johnny Depp.

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: Two scientists devise a revolutionary process to produce energy from water - but instead of receiving professional acclaim, their work is subject to hi-tech sabotage. The pair are then framed for the murder of their mentor and forced to go on the run to clear their names. Action thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Rachel Weisz, Morgan Freeman, Fred Ward and Brian Cox.

programme.title: The Last Samurai
programme.desc: The emperor of Japan recruits an American Civil War veteran to train his troops in a bid to wipe out a rebel faction of samurai warriors. The soldier is taken captive when the imperial army is defeated, and comes to respect his enemies' traditions and code of honour, finally going over to their side. Historical adventure, starring Tom Cruise, Ken Watanabe, Timothy Spall, Billy Connolly and Shichinosuke Nakamura.

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: A federal agent investigating the bombing of a ferryboat in New Orleans is given access by the government to a top-secret device that allows him to see into the past. He focuses on one victim in particular, a woman whom he believes holds the key to the crime, and becomes convinced that he can prevent the explosion ever happening. Sci-fi thriller, with Denzel Washington, Paula Patton, Val Kilmer and Jim Caviezel.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: A band of samurai is betrayed by a ruthless warlord who murders the warriors' master and banishes them from their homeland. They receive fresh hope in the shape of a mysterious former slave, who leads them into battle against monstrous and magical enemies as they seek to reclaim their former status. Fantasy adventure, starring Keanu Reeves and Hiroyuki Sanada.

programme.title: Gangster Squad
programme.desc: A New York gangster brings his criminal organisation to Los Angeles in 1949, rapidly seizing control of the city's criminal activity and corrupting the authorities to ensure no one stands up to him. The chief of police discreetly sets up a secret task force with the intention of bringing the mobster to justice. Crime thriller, starring Josh Brolin, Ryan Gosling and Sean Penn.

programme.title: Coming Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Two sisters who have not spoken in years bury the hatchet when they learn their mother and father have split up. They plan to push their parents back together by organising a family Christmas celebration in the house they grew up in. The only problem is that someone else lives there now. Family drama, starring real-life sisters Carly and Britt McKillip.

programme.title: Snow Buddies
programme.desc: Five talking puppies get trapped inside an ice-cream truck that ends up in the wilds of Alaska. But as they try to make their way home, they meet a husky pup who asks them to make up a team to compete in a two-day dog-sled race. Family adventure sequel, starring Richard Karn and Cynthia Stevenson, with the voices of James Belushi and Whoopi Goldberg.

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: A workaholic father tries to make up for his perpetual absence from home by promising to buy his son a hugely popular action figure for Christmas - little realising every other father in town has the same idea. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sinbad, Jake Lloyd, Rita Wilson, Robert Conrad and Phil Hartman.

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men
programme.desc: Two cantankerous elderly neighbours have known each other a lifetime, and to liven up their otherwise dull existences they continually trade insults - but the arrival of an attractive widow in the area gives them real grounds to argue. Comedy, starring Jack Lemmon, Walter Matthau, Ann-Margret, Burgess Meredith and Daryl Hannah.

programme.title: Jack Frost
programme.desc: A rock musician who realises he is spending too much time away from his family is killed in a car accident while travelling home for the festive season. The following year his spirit takes on the form of a snowman, made by his son, allowing them to spend one last Christmas together. Fantasy drama, starring Michael Keaton, Kelly Preston, Joseph Cross and Mark Addy.

programme.title: New Year's Eve
programme.desc: Various New Yorkers wrestle with personal and romantic challenges in their lives on the last night of the year, including a record company executive determined to make a fresh start and a dying man who wants to join the traditional Times Square festivities one last time. Comedy drama, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert De Niro, Halle Berry, Sarah Jessica Parker and Zac Efron.

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men
programme.desc: Two cantankerous elderly neighbours have known each other a lifetime, and to liven up their otherwise dull existences they continually trade insults - but the arrival of an attractive widow in the area gives them real grounds to argue. Comedy, starring Jack Lemmon, Walter Matthau, Ann-Margret, Burgess Meredith and Daryl Hannah.

programme.title: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: An American householder is dismayed when his plans for a traditional festive family holiday are thrown into complete disarray by a succession of annoying neighbours and long-lost relatives, who turn up on his doorstep offering their own brand of Christmas cheer. Comedy, starring Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Randy Quaid, Diane Ladd, Juliette Lewis, Miriam Flynn, Johnny Galecki and William Hickey.

programme.title: Jack Frost

Fantasy drama, starring Michael Keaton, Kelly Preston, Joseph Cross and Mark Addy.

Comedy drama, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert De Niro, Halle Berry, Sarah Jessica Parker and Zac Efron.

Comedy, starring Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Randy Quaid, Diane Ladd, Juliette Lewis, Miriam Flynn, Johnny Galecki and William Hickey.

programme.title: Home Alone: The Holiday Heist
programme.desc: A 10-year-old boy's family moves to a new house which he is convinced is haunted, so he sets a series of booby traps to catch the ghost. The gadgets come in handy when his parents get stranded out of town and a trio of bumbling crooks plan to rob the place. Comedy sequel, starring Christian Martyn and Malcolm McDowell.

programme.title: Snow Buddies
programme.desc: Five talking puppies get trapped inside an ice-cream truck that ends up in the wilds of Alaska. But as they try to make their way home, they meet a husky pup who asks them to make up a team to compete in a two-day dog-sled race. Family adventure sequel, starring Richard Karn and Cynthia Stevenson, with the voices of James Belushi and Whoopi Goldberg.

programme.title: Holiday Inn
programme.desc: A song-and-dance man tires of the bright lights and retires to a farm, but boredom soon prompts him to dream up an ambitious plan for the place. Musical, featuring the classic song White Christmas, starring Bing Crosby, Fred Astaire and Virginia Dale.

programme.title: Awakenings
programme.desc: A research doctor in a New York psychiatric hospital provokes equal measures of professional interest and suspicion when he appears to have discovered a means of reviving patients who have been trapped in a catatonic state for over 30 years. Fact-based drama, starring Robin Williams, Robert De Niro, Julie Kavner, Penelope Ann Miller, Max von Sydow and Alice Drummond.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb Special
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of the third film in the fantasy comedy series.

programme.title: Best Christmas Movies Ever
programme.desc: A countdown of the 26 greatest festive films, featuring contributions from celebrity fans including Jim Carrey, Ashley Jensen, Jonathan Ross and Warwick Davis, and stories from cast members including Zach Galligan (Gremlins), Mara Wilson (Miracle on 34th Street) and Daniel Stern (Home Alone).

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
programme.desc: A London man's misfortunes in love look set to change when he meets an American beauty. However, the prospect of a transatlantic relationship succeeding seems slim, so the pair go their separate ways - only for him to realise he is unable to get her out of his mind. Richard Curtis's comedy, with Hugh Grant, Andie MacDowell, John Hannah, Charlotte Coleman, Kristin Scott Thomas, Simon Callow and James Fleet.

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: A party of explorers studying the sunken remains of the famous liner meets an elderly woman who was a passenger on the ill-fated maiden voyage. She recounts how she boarded the ship while on the brink of being forced into marriage by her family, and was stopped from killing herself by a penniless artist. She fell in love with her saviour, but the disaster on the horizon meant their time together was doomed to be short. James Cameron's Oscar-winning romantic drama, starring Kate Winslet, Leonardo DiCaprio, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates and Bill Paxton.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
programme.desc: An ordinary man seeks solace from his mundane life by drifting into daydreams where he is a heroic figure. When he and a friend are faced with unemployment, he is propelled into a globetrotting adventure in real life. Comedy drama based on James Thurber's short story, directed by and starring Ben Stiller. With Kristen Wiig, Adam Scott and Shirley MacLaine.

programme.title: Les Miserables
programme.desc: A former prisoner tries to lead an honest life in post-revolutionary France, despite being pursued everywhere by a fanatical police inspector. He promises a poverty-stricken factory worker that he will raise her child, a relationship that gives his life new meaning, but both of them are drawn into an uprising against the reinstated monarchy. Musical, starring Hugh Jackman, Russell Crowe and Anne Hathaway.

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: A party of explorers studying the sunken remains of the famous liner meets an elderly woman who was a passenger on the ill-fated maiden voyage. She recounts how she boarded the ship while on the brink of being forced into marriage by her family, and was stopped from killing herself by a penniless artist. She fell in love with her saviour, but the disaster on the horizon meant their time together was doomed to be short. James Cameron's Oscar-winning romantic drama, starring Kate Winslet, Leonardo DiCaprio, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates and Bill Paxton.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
programme.desc: An ordinary man seeks solace from his mundane life by drifting into daydreams where he is a heroic figure. When he and a friend are faced with unemployment, he is propelled into a globetrotting adventure in real life. Comedy drama based on James Thurber's short story, directed by and starring Ben Stiller. With Kristen Wiig, Adam Scott and Shirley MacLaine.

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
programme.desc: A London man's misfortunes in love look set to change when he meets an American beauty. However, the prospect of a transatlantic relationship succeeding seems slim, so the pair go their separate ways - only for him to realise he is unable to get her out of his mind. Richard Curtis's comedy, with Hugh Grant, Andie MacDowell, John Hannah, Charlotte Coleman, Kristin Scott Thomas, Simon Callow and James Fleet.

programme.title: Giant
programme.desc: A prominent Texas ranching family suffers a change in fortunes over the course of two generations, while a poor neighbour unexpectedly strikes it rich when oil is found on his land. Director George Stevens' Oscar-winning epic drama, starring James Dean in his final film role alongside Rock Hudson, Elizabeth Taylor, Dennis Hopper, Carroll Baker, Mercedes McCambridge and Sal Mineo.

programme.title: Mad Hot Ballroom
programme.desc: Marilyn Agrelo's documentary following children from three New York schools as they take part in a ballroom-dancing contest. Focusing on three sets of pupils from very different backgrounds, the film captures the 11-year-olds' struggles and triumphs, as they practise their steps while learning about friendship and culture.

programme.title: Confetti
programme.desc: Three couples compete for the title of Most Original Wedding of the Year, with a film crew following the preparations. Theatre-loving Matt and Sam plan a musical marriage, naturists Michael and Joanna brave the elements for their all-nude nuptials, while fiercely competitive Josef and Isabelle warm up for a sporty ceremony. Spoof documentary, starring Martin Freeman, Jessica Hynes, Robert Webb, Olivia Colman, Stephen Mangan and Meredith MacNeill.

programme.title: One Chance
programme.desc: Fact-based comedy drama following the rise to fame of amateur opera singer Paul Potts. Throughout his school days as a bullied outsider and mundane adulthood as a mobile phone salesman, he longs to make something of his love of opera, finally getting his opportunity in a TV talent show. Starring James Corden, Julie Walters, Colm Meaney and Mackenzie Crook.

programme.title: The Full Monty
programme.desc: Six unemployed men from Sheffield decide to become strippers for one night only in a bid to raise extra money. However, with no dancing experience and far from perfect physiques, the men rely on the unique selling point of complete nudity to impress the punters. Comedy, starring Robert Carlyle, Mark Addy, Tom Wilkinson, Hugo Speer and Paul Barber.

programme.title: The Book Thief
programme.desc: A girl separated from her family is raised by foster parents in Nazi Germany, who instill in her a love of reading. She is horrified by the book burnings and tries to save volumes from the flames, while she and her adoptive family provide a safe hiding place for a Jewish boy. Drama based on Markus Zusak's novel, starring Sophie Nelisse, Geoffrey Rush and Emily Watson.

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: A woman with dreams of becoming a journalist takes a job as assistant to the editor of a prestigious fashion magazine - a position that should guarantee a bright future if she succeeds. Unfortunately, she has just signed up to work for the boss from hell, whose cruel personality and outrageous demands make her life a nightmare. Comedy drama, with Meryl Streep, Anne Hathaway, Stanley Tucci and Emily Blunt.

programme.title: Confetti
programme.desc: Three couples compete for the title of Most Original Wedding of the Year, with a film crew following the preparations. Theatre-loving Matt and Sam plan a musical marriage, naturists Michael and Joanna brave the elements for their all-nude nuptials, while fiercely competitive Josef and Isabelle warm up for a sporty ceremony. Spoof documentary, starring Martin Freeman, Jessica Hynes, Robert Webb, Olivia Colman, Stephen Mangan and Meredith MacNeill.

programme.title: The Book Thief
programme.desc: A girl separated from her family is raised by foster parents in Nazi Germany, who instill in her a love of reading. She is horrified by the book burnings and tries to save volumes from the flames, while she and her adoptive family provide a safe hiding place for a Jewish boy. Drama based on Markus Zusak's novel, starring Sophie Nelisse, Geoffrey Rush and Emily Watson.

programme.title: The Full Monty
programme.desc: Six unemployed men from Sheffield decide to become strippers for one night only in a bid to raise extra money. However, with no dancing experience and far from perfect physiques, the men rely on the unique selling point of complete nudity to impress the punters. Comedy, starring Robert Carlyle, Mark Addy, Tom Wilkinson, Hugo Speer and Paul Barber.

programme.title: This Is 40
programme.desc: A couple wrestle with a series of crises as their 40th birthdays loom on the horizon, turning to friends and family for help in coping with the challenges of work, parenthood, age and debt. Comedy, starring Paul Rudd and Leslie Mann reprising their roles from Knocked Up. With Megan Fox, Albert Brooks and John Lithgow.

programme.title: The Four Feathers
programme.desc: A crisis of conscience prompts an officer to resign from the military, earning him the disdain of his friends and peers - so in an attempt to win back their respect, he embarks on a perilous undercover mission in the Sudan. Historical adventure based on the classic tale by AEW Mason, starring Heath Ledger, Wes Bentley, Kate Hudson and Djimon Hounsou.

programme.title: Sweet Charity
programme.desc: A lonely but optimistic dancer in a seedy nightclub goes in search of true love, but finds instead a succession of deceitful men who only let her down. When she meets a shy, claustrophobic man in a lift, she thinks he might be the one - but tries to keep her past a secret. Musical, with Shirley MacLaine, John McMartin, Ricardo Montalban and Sammy Davis Jr, and featuring songs including The Rhythm of Life and Big Spender.

programme.title: The Love Letter
programme.desc: A divorced single mother becomes involved in a tangled web of unrequited love after discovering a romantic note and wrongly assuming it was meant for her. Meanwhile, the misunderstanding leads to revelations among her group of friends. Comedy drama based on the novel by Cathleen Schine, starring Kate Capshaw, Tom Selleck, Gloria Stuart, Geraldine McEwan and Ellen DeGeneres.

programme.title: Being Flynn
programme.desc: A failed writer finds new purpose when he volunteers at a homeless shelter, but his life begins to unravel when his estranged father, who has neglected his family all their lives, turns up seeking a bed for the night. As they try to rebuild their relationship, the author fears he is doomed to repeat the old man's mistakes. Drama, starring Robert De Niro, Paul Dano and Julianne Moore.

programme.title: Sunshine on Leith
programme.desc: Two soldiers return home to the Scottish port town after finishing their tour of duty in Afghanistan. While they struggle to adjust to life as civilians, the parents of one of the squaddies prepare to celebrate their 30th anniversary in style. Musical featuring songs by the Proclaimers, starring George MacKay, Kevin Guthrie, Peter Mullan and Jane Horrocks.

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Two sisters have little in common - one is a financially irresponsible flirt and the other is a mature and staid lawyer. However, the pair are brought together when a dark family secret comes to light. Curtis Hanson's comedy drama, based on a novel by Jennifer Weiner, starring Cameron Diaz, Toni Collette and Shirley MacLaine.

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: A single man gets the chance to turn his unhappy life around when his father reveals that they both have the ability to travel through time and change their personal history. He uses his newfound talent to try to improve his love life and win the heart of an American woman he has fallen for. Romantic fantasy comedy, with Domhnall Gleeson, Rachel McAdams and Bill Nighy.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during the summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in the 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.

programme.title: Sunshine on Leith
programme.desc: Two soldiers return home to the Scottish port town after finishing their tour of duty in Afghanistan. While they struggle to adjust to life as civilians, the parents of one of the squaddies prepare to celebrate their 30th anniversary in style. Musical featuring songs by the Proclaimers, starring George MacKay, Kevin Guthrie, Peter Mullan and Jane Horrocks.

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Two sisters have little in common - one is a financially irresponsible flirt and the other is a mature and staid lawyer. However, the pair are brought together when a dark family secret comes to light. Curtis Hanson's comedy drama, based on a novel by Jennifer Weiner, starring Cameron Diaz, Toni Collette and Shirley MacLaine.

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: A single man gets the chance to turn his unhappy life around when his father reveals that they both have the ability to travel through time and change their personal history. He uses his newfound talent to try to improve his love life and win the heart of an American woman he has fallen for. Romantic fantasy comedy, with Domhnall Gleeson, Rachel McAdams and Bill Nighy.

programme.title: Tootsie
programme.desc: A New York actor's difficult reputation has rendered him unemployable. When a TV soap advertises a new female role, he disguises himself as a woman for the audition - and wins the part. But the character proves so popular, he is forced to keep up the pretence indefinitely. Comedy, starring Dustin Hoffman, Jessica Lange and Bill Murray. Directed by Sydney Pollack, who makes a cameo appearance as Hoffman's agent.

programme.title: The Sessions
programme.desc: Writer Mark has survived polio, but still needs to use an iron lung. At the age of 38, he has begun a writing career but has never had sex. With the support of his parish priest, he enlists the help of a sex therapist in gaining the confidence to lose his virginity. Comedy drama, starring John Hawkes, Helen Hunt and William H Macy.

programme.title: All About Eve
programme.desc: An ageing stage star is flattered by the attention of an adoring fan, and decides to take the young woman under her wing as her personal assistant - unaware that her new protegee is really a ruthlessly ambitious, budding actor who will do all that it takes to steal the limelight. Oscar-winning drama, starring Bette Davis, Anne Baxter, George Sanders, Thelma Ritter, Marilyn Monroe and Celeste Holm.

programme.title: Austenland
programme.desc: A New York woman obsessed with Pride and Prejudice takes the chance to live out her fantasies by spending her life savings on a trip to a Jane Austen theme park in Britain, where she gets to live the life of a regency lady - and hopefully catch the eye of a real Mr Darcy. Comedy based on Shannon Hale's novel, starring Keri Russell and JJ Feild.

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally
programme.desc: A man and a woman with different attitudes to life meet by chance and develop a close and long-lasting friendship. But over time, a mutual sexual attraction begins to develop and threatens to ruin their relationship - raising the question whether men and women can ever really be just friends. Romantic comedy, starring Billy Crystal and Meg Ryan.

programme.title: Take the Lead
programme.desc: A former professional dancer volunteers to pass on his skills to disruptive students in New York's public schools. At first the teenagers and their teachers are sceptical, but he eventually inspires them and persuades the kids to compete in a prestigious contest - in which his classical training and their love of hip-hop fuse to create an entirely new dance style. Fact-based drama, starring Antonio Banderas, Alfre Woodard and Rob Brown.

programme.title: Philomena
programme.desc: A teenager in 1950s Ireland becomes pregnant, and is sent to a home for `fallen women', while her baby is forcibly taken from her and sent to America to be adopted. Fifty years later, she meets a disillusioned political journalist who helps to reunite her with her son. Fact-based drama, starring Judi Dench and Steve Coogan.

programme.title: The Notebook
programme.desc: An elderly man reads a love story to a woman in a nursing home, from an old notebook full of sentimental scribblings about a passionate young couple whose fledgling affair is smothered almost before it has begun. Romantic drama, starring Ryan Gosling, Rachel McAdams, Gena Rowlands and James Garner.

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: Brash yuppie car dealer Charlie discovers his deceased father has left the family fortune to Raymond, the autistic elder brother he never knew he had. In a bid to get his hands on the money, he tracks down and abducts Raymond - but the ensuing cross-country journey proves to be a profound learning experience. Oscar-winning drama, starring Tom Cruise and Dustin Hoffman, with Valeria Golino, Gerald R Molen and Jack Murdock.

programme.title: Take the Lead
programme.desc: A former professional dancer volunteers to pass on his skills to disruptive students in New York's public schools. At first the teenagers and their teachers are sceptical, but he eventually inspires them and persuades the kids to compete in a prestigious contest - in which his classical training and their love of hip-hop fuse to create an entirely new dance style. Fact-based drama, starring Antonio Banderas, Alfre Woodard and Rob Brown.

Fifty years later, she meets a disillusioned political journalist who helps to reunite her with her son. Fact-based drama, starring Judi Dench and Steve Coogan.

But over time, a mutual sexual attraction begins to develop and threatens to ruin their relationship - raising the question whether men and women can ever really be just friends. Romantic comedy, starring Billy Crystal and Meg Ryan.

programme.title: Cloud Atlas
programme.desc: The lives of various individuals over 600 years throughout history are connected, from a sea voyage in the 19th century to a dystopian civilisation 500 years in the future, with their actions having far-reaching repercussions. Sci-fi drama based on David Mitchell's novel, starring Tom Hanks, Halle Berry, Jim Broadbent and Hugo Weaving in various roles throughout the film's different eras.

credits.director: Tom Tykwer, Andy Wachowski, Lana Wachowski

programme.title: Legends of the Fall
programme.desc: A retired army colonel has raised his three sons alone on their remote Montana ranch. But the all-male household is thrown into turmoil when the youngest son brings home his beautiful fiancee, causing jealousy and tensions that culminate in tragedy. Edward Zwick's period drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Brad Pitt, Aidan Quinn, Julia Ormond and Henry Thomas.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger Unmasked
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of the Western from the director of Pirates of the Caribbean, starring Armie Hammer and Johnny Depp.(n)

programme.title: You've Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rivals in the bookshop business fall in love over the internet, unaware they know and dislike each other in the real world. While things remain frosty in person, the pair's anonymous online relationship continues to blossom. Romantic comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Meg Ryan, Greg Kinnear, Parker Posey and Dabney Coleman.(n)

programme.title: Alien Autopsy
programme.desc: Video dealer Ray and his friend Gary stumble onto what seems to be footage of an alien autopsy and plan to sell it. But when the film is destroyed, they resort to re-creating the incident in their kitchen. Comedy, based on the infamous 1995 hoax, starring Anthony McPartlin, Declan Donnelly, Omid Djalili, Bill Pullman and Harry Dean Stanton.(n)

programme.title: Last Vegas
programme.desc: A sixtysomething confirmed bachelor finally decides to settle down with his much younger girlfriend. He and three friends decide to mark the occasion by reliving their wild youth with a trip to Las Vegas - but they find that both the city and each other have changed since their glory days. Comedy, starring Michael Douglas, Robert De Niro, Morgan Freeman and Kevin Kline.(n)

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally
programme.desc: A man and a woman with different attitudes to life meet by chance and develop a close and long-lasting friendship. But over time, a mutual sexual attraction begins to develop and threatens to ruin their relationship - raising the question whether men and women can ever really be just friends. Romantic comedy, starring Billy Crystal and Meg Ryan.(n)

programme.title: Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues
programme.desc: Arrogant newsreader Ron Burgundy's career is rescued from a drunken slump by an executive for a new 24-hour news channel. Reassembling his team of sidekicks, he swiftly rises from the network's graveyard to become its biggest star with a run of ludicrously sensationalist broadcasts. Comedy sequel, starring Will Ferrell, Christina Applegate, Paul Rudd and Steve Carell.(n)

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A Nascar racing champion has everything he could want - until an arrogant French rival seizes the title from him, and his wife runs off with his best friend. Forced to move back in with his parents, the downhearted driver faces a battle to rebuild his shattered self-confidence and return to the track. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, John C Reilly and Sacha Baron Cohen.(n)

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
programme.desc: Drinking buddies Phil and Stu try to help their troubled friend Alan get his life in order, only to stumble into another bizarre misadventure. The Mob have taken Alan's brother hostage and to free him, they have to track down manic gangster Mr Chow, who has escaped from a Thai prison. Comedy sequel, starring Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis and John Goodman.(n)

programme.title: Last Vegas
programme.desc: A sixtysomething confirmed bachelor finally decides to settle down with his much younger girlfriend. He and three friends decide to mark the occasion by reliving their wild youth with a trip to Las Vegas - but they find that both the city and each other have changed since their glory days. Comedy, starring Michael Douglas, Robert De Niro, Morgan Freeman and Kevin Kline.(n)

Forced to move back in with his parents, the downhearted driver faces a battle to rebuild his shattered self-confidence and return to the track. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, John C Reilly and Sacha Baron Cohen.(n)

programme.title: Turbo: Sky Movies Special
programme.desc: Alex Zane finds out about the making of the animated comedy about a super-fast snail.(n)

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: An immature 32-year-old is heartbroken when his girlfriend walks out on him. In a plan to win her back, he volunteers to look after his flatmate's five-year-old son, thus demonstrating he is finally ready to grow up. However, his ideas of childcare prove unconventional and chaos quickly ensues. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Josh Mostel, Leslie Mann, Rob Schneider and Kristy Swanson, alongside Steve Buscemi in a cameo role.(n)

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: A washed-up quarterback ends up in jail after a drunken night out, and is ordered by the warden to put together an American football team to take on the guards, with the help of a former college champ. Remake of 1974 comedy The Mean Machine, with Adam Sandler, Chris Rock, Nelly and Burt Reynolds, who starred in the original.(n)

programme.title: Grown Ups 2
programme.desc: A man moves his family back to the town where he grew up, so his children can have the same upbringing he had. While he and his three childhood friends try to relive their lost youth, they discover their kids have a thing or two to teach them during the last day of school. Comedy sequel, starring Adam Sandler, Chris Rock, Kevin James and David Spade.(n)

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: A boy has to fend for himself when he is accidentally left behind after his family jets off to Paris for Christmas. The youngster initially enjoys his freedom, but is soon forced to resort to ingenious booby traps to defend the family home from two dim-witted burglars. Comedy, starring Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard, Catherine O'Hara and John Candy.(n)

programme.title: The Mask
programme.desc: A timid bank clerk stumbles on an ancient mask, which endows whoever wears it with untold superhuman powers, unbridled self-confidence and an irresistible charm for the ladies. Unfortunately, he earns the enmity of a local gangster for daring to flirt with his girlfriend - and when the crook gets wind of the artefact's existence, he covets the power for himself. Comic-book comedy, with Jim Carrey, Cameron Diaz, Peter Riegert and Peter Greene.(n)

programme.title: Mr Deeds
programme.desc: A naive pizza parlour owner inherits $40billion and moves to New York, where he encounters unscrupulous opportunists keen to get their hands on the money - and a ruthless reporter determined to tell his story. Remake of 1936 romantic comedy Mr Deeds Goes to Town, with Adam Sandler, Winona Ryder, John Turturro, Allen Covert, Peter Gallagher and Jared Harris.(n)

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A hard-working businessman gets his hands on a remote control that enables him to manipulate all aspects of his life - including fast-forwarding through the bits he would rather miss. However, the device takes on a mind of its own and starts causing him to skip entire years. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Christopher Walken and Kate Beckinsale.(n)

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: An immature 32-year-old is heartbroken when his girlfriend walks out on him. In a plan to win her back, he volunteers to look after his flatmate's five-year-old son, thus demonstrating he is finally ready to grow up. However, his ideas of childcare prove unconventional and chaos quickly ensues. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Josh Mostel, Leslie Mann, Rob Schneider and Kristy Swanson, alongside Steve Buscemi in a cameo role.(n)
